title: From $140K Call to $80K Put: Bitcoin (BTC) Positioning Reverses Completely

title: Asia Morning Briefing: BTC Market Stress Reveals a New Crypto Order

title: US Senate banking chair eyes vote on crypto market bill next month

title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest stocks up on Coinbase, Circle and Bullish shares

title: Trump Congressional Ally Discloses Latest Six-Figure Bitcoin Purchase

title: Pump’s new ‘Mayhem Mode’ fails to boost token launches or revenue in first week

title: Kraken Scores $800M Raise Backed by $200M Citadel Securities Investment

title: Kraken’s valuation hits $20 billion following Citadel Securities’ ‘strategic investment’ as exchange pushes toward IPO

title: Crypto Exchange Kraken Raises $800 Million at a $20 Billion Valuation

title: Monad addresses Coinbase token sale slowdown as risk of undersubscription grows

title: Bitcoin Billionaire Arthur Hayes Blames Crypto Plunge on 'Contraction in Dollar Liquidity'

title: Treasury Dept. Says Banks Can Keep Crypto On Their Balance Sheets in Certain Cases

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
